headline: US Financial 15 Split Corp. Preferred Dividend Declared
summary: TORONTO, Feb. 19, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- US Financial 15 Split Corp ("US Financial 15") declares its monthly distribution of $0.07275 for each Preferred share, or 10.00% annually based on the previous month end net asset value. Distributions are payable March 10, 2026 to shareholders on record as at February 27, 2026. US Financial 15 invests in a portfolio consisting of 15 U.S. financial services companies as follows:American Express, Bank of America, Bank of New York Mellon Corp., Citigroup,
